comment: Alternate proof of ~ upgr1eop , using the general theorem ~ gropeld to transform a theorem for an arbitrary representation of a graph into a theorem for a graph represented as ordered pair. This general approach causes some overhead, which makes the proof longer than necessary (see proof of ~ upgr1eop ). (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
